title: Shutdown Fullcast 3.9
description:
Things are totally normal on this week's Shutdown Fullcast as the usual cast of Steven Godfrey, Jason Kirk, and Ryan Nanni, discussing:
-- The Big 12's imminent expansion
-- The Big 12's imminent collapse
-- Living in Orlando: you can do that, apparently?
-- How nuclear winter leads to a reborn, hard-as-hell Big 8
-- How that same nuclear winter plays right into Bill Snyder's hands
-- Paul Johnson's Intervention/Recruiting
-- Godfrey's retirement business plan, Chick-fil-Agnostic
-- Canadian legal precedent. Shit, we've completely lost the damn plot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
